title: Ola BOSS 72-hour sale offers huge discounts on S1 scooters: Here’s what you get
description: Ola Electric has launched the "BOSS 72-hour Rush," offering significant discounts on its S1 electric scooter portfolio, as part of its festive sale. Running from October 10 to October 12, the sale includes prices as low as ₹49,999 for the S1 X 2kWh model, alongside perks worth up to ₹25,000 on select models. Ola is also expanding its service network, with plans to open 1,000 centers by the end of this year as part of its #HyperService campaign.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
